an5.127:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nālaṃ saṃghamhā vapakāsituṃ.
an5.127:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena piṇḍapātena, asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena senāsanena, asantuṭṭho hoti itarītarena gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena, kāmasaṅkappabahulo ca viharati.
an5.127:4.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu nālaṃ saṃghamhā vapakāsituṃ.
an5.127:5.1: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ saṃghamhā vapakāsituṃ.
an5.127:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena cīvarena, santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena piṇḍapātena, santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena senāsanena, santuṭṭho hoti itarītarena gilānappaccayabhesajjaparikkhārena, nekkhammasaṅkappabahulo ca viharati.
an5.127:5.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu alaṃ saṃghamhā vapakāsitun”ti.
